title: All the text bugs with all the champion abilities (images included)(Part 1)
body:
http://i.imgur.com/Pt36AFh.png
Anivia's Q movement speed reduction indicates 0.

http://i.imgur.com/36PO2TW.png
Annie's R Tibbers basic attack damage indicates 0% AP

http://i.imgur.com/zMBFuNO.png
Ashe's Q indicates 0 AD Ratio and the range shouldn't be there

http://i.imgur.com/JfyHaVO.png
Ashe's W should indicate Total AD instead of nothing

http://i.imgur.com/IKqInjj.png
Aurelion Sol's W indicates 0 damage and 0 AP Ratio. It should also indicate the passive's basic damage + AP Ratio without 50% extra damage

http://i.imgur.com/EoPDCDq.png
Azir's Q has no cooldown

http://i.imgur.com/Esyw6d7.png
Azir's W has no cooldown, no base damage and no soldier cooldown

http://i.imgur.com/pH6EBuK.png
Azir's E has no cooldown and the other underlined number shouldn't be here

http://i.imgur.com/tYGb9NN.png
Bard's Q has 25000 range

http://i.imgur.com/CU8jtZX.png
Bard's W active shrines shouldn't be included here

http://i.imgur.com/foH2rQb.png
Brand's Q cooldown should be 8/7.5/7/6.5/6

http://i.imgur.com/XKPwfm3.png
Brand's W cooldown should be 10/9.5/9/8.5/8

http://i.imgur.com/HbqApRR.png
Braum'Q underlined number shouldn't be here

http://i.imgur.com/lgecaSL.png
Braum's E has 25000 range

http://i.imgur.com/59bzH7C.png
Caitlyn's Q has 0 AD Ratio. It should also include if it's Total AD or Bonus AD

http://i.imgur.com/eOqvVIu.png
Caitlyn's W has 0 AD Ratio. It should also include if it's Total AD or Bonus AD

http://i.imgur.com/t7KIVl4.png
Cassiopeia's E should have a small cooldown, and should include the AP ratio of the heal

http://i.imgur.com/WtYsV5n.png
Corki's Q has no AD Ratio. It should also include if it's Total AD or Bonus AD

http://i.imgur.com/hHUOatM.png
Corki's W passive has no base damage and no AD Ratio. It should also include if it's Total AD or Bonus AD

http://i.imgur.com/9UQ4zoa.png
Corki's R should also include if it's Total AD or Bonus AD

http://i.imgur.com/ptHgz2p.png
Darius's W should only include the AD Ratio

More to come tomorrow.

replies.body: QA for Champion Details Pages, here. Thank you so much for collecting these and putting them into a post. We are currently aware of values being displayed incorrectly in some of these special cases and we will be doing another sweep of fixes to these within the next few patches. Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you again for this incredible post.
I can still post ALL of the small bugs if needed. Will do in a few hours since I like doing this :D
Hey! Sorry I was busy yesterday! I will post them in the next hour on another topic.

There are also issues with champions such as Elise and Jayce, where the second ability isn't shown. I have made a post about this, along with a suggestion to create a second icon bar for multi form champions.
Really nice. Ryze also has videos from before his rework. The icons and descriptions are right, but the videos aren't
